blogPost.excerpt: Over 20% of females struggle with a hormone-related issue such as PCOS, endometriosis, or amenorrhea. Pollie is your friend at every step of your hormonal health journey, from finding your best-fit specialist to symptom tracking.
blogPost.body: Over 20% of females struggle with a hormone-related issue such as PCOS, endometriosis, or amenorrhea. Pollie is your friend at every step of your hormonal health journey, from finding your best-fit specialist to symptom tracking.
blogPost.title: Pollie - Hormonal health, simplified
blogPost.author: Jane Sagui

localize.description: 20% 以上的女性都在为荷尔蒙相关的问题而烦恼，如 PCOS、子宫内膜异位症或闭经。在您的荷尔蒙健康之旅的每一步，从寻找最适合您的专家到症状跟踪，Pollie都是您的朋友。
20% 以上的女性都在爲荷爾蒙相關的問題而煩惱，如 PCOS、子宮內膜異位症或閉經。在您的荷爾蒙健康之旅的每一步，從尋找最適合您的專家到症狀跟蹤，Pollie都是您的朋友。

previous.excerpt: Allfactor is the leading market analytics platform that provides data-driven solutions for ecommerce brands to thrive in the industry. The tools enable sellers to optimize product offering, track performance, and conduct competitive analysis across platforms.
previous.title: Allfactor Analytics - The leading market analytics platform for data e-commerce

localize.description: Allfactor是领先的市场分析平台，为电商品牌提供数据驱动的解决方案，使其在行业中蓬勃发展。这些工具使卖家能够优化产品供应，跟踪业绩，并进行跨平台的竞争分析。
localize.tagline: 领先的数据电商市场分析平台。

localize.description: Allfactor是領先的市場分析平臺，爲電商品牌提供數據驅動的解決方案，使其在行業中蓬勃發展。這些工具使賣家能夠優化產品供應，跟蹤業績，並進行跨平臺的競爭分析。
localize.tagline: 領先的數據電商市場分析平臺。

next.excerpt: Planning a Clubhouse meetup soon? Then you need to invite to your room as many people as possible. Let’s do it via social media: Twitter, Telegram, and Instagram. Put your content on the main artboard and get cards for all three platforms at once.
next.title: Clubhouse Cards - Announce your next meetup to as many people as possible

localize.description: 计划近期举行会所聚会？那么你需要邀请尽可能多的人到你的房间。让我们通过社交媒体来进行。Twitter, Telegram, and Instagram. 把你的内容放在主图板上，一次获得三个平台的卡片。
localize.tagline: 向尽可能多的人宣布你的下一次见面会。

localize.description: 計劃近期舉行會所聚會？那麼你需要邀請儘可能多的人到你的房間。讓我們通過社交媒體來進行。Twitter, Telegram, and Instagram. 把你的內容放在主圖板上，一次獲得三個平臺的卡片。
localize.tagline: 向儘可能多的人宣佈你的下一次見面會。
